problem: 如图,任意四边形ABCD各边中点分别是E、F、G、H,若对角线AC、BD的长都为20cm,则四边形EFGH的周长是()
answer: 利用三角形中位线定理易得所求四边形的各边长都等于AC,或BD的一半,进而求四边形周长即可.
problem_en: As shown in the figure, the midpoints of each side of any quadrilateral ABCD are E, F, G, and H respectively. If the lengths of the diagonals AC and BD are all N_0, then the perimeter of the quadrilateral EFGH is ()
